rukus.text: hananim-eun gul-yog-ui jaeang-eulo buteo iseula-el baegseong-eul guhayeoss-euni
palaolo buteola sillo geuneun omanhan joein-ila
hananim-eun jihyelosseo yeoleo min jogjung-eseo geudeul-eul seontaeghaeseo
geudeul-ege yejeungdeul-eul buyeoha yeoss-euni geu an-eneun bunmyeonghan siheom-i eossnola
uliga hanbeon jug-eumyeon dasi buhwaldoeji anhnola
geuleomeulo neohuiga jinsil-ilamyeon-uli seonjodeul-eul doedollyeo jula hani
geudeul-eun tubaui baegseong-gwa ijeon ui baegseongdeul boda ganghada saeng-gaghaneu nyo hananim-eun geudeul-i nah-eun joeag-eu lo malmiam-a geudeul-eul myeolmangke haessno la
hananimkkeseo cheonjileul changjohagogeu saie issneun modeun geos-eul changjohan geos-eun dansunhan olag-i anila
geugeosdeul-eul jinlilo changjohayeoss-eudoe geudeul daedasuneun ihaehaji mosha nola
sillo simpan-ui nal-eun geudeul modu leul wihae jeonghayeojin nal-ini
geunal-eun chinguga geuui chingue ge yuyonghaji anihago doumdo bad eul su eobsneun nal-ila
geuleona hananimkkeseo eunhyeleul bepun janeun je-oela sillo hananim-eun gwonneung-gwa jabilo chungmanhasim-ila
